member.name: P:MvvmCross.Plugin.Location.MvxLocationOptions.TimeBetweenUpdates
member.summary: Use TimeSpan.Zero for most frequent updates

member.name: P:MvvmCross.Plugin.Location.MvxLocationOptions.MovementThresholdInM

member.name: P:MvvmCross.Plugin.Location.MvxLocationOptions.TrackingMode
